description: The price of Samsung Galaxy J2 Prime is 8,990 BDT. Samsung Galaxy J2 Prime smartphone comes with 5.0 inches PLS TFT capacitive touchscreen display and performing 1.4 GHz, Mediatek MT6737T 855 Octa-core processor. It has 1.5 GB of RAM and 8 GB internal storage, which can be expanded to 256 GB with external storage. This stylish device has an 8 MP in the back and a 5 MP camera on the front side. It was powered by a standard 2600 mAh removal Li-Ion battery.
